```{r scree,echo=FALSE,include=FALSE,results='hide'}
library(xtable)
library(Hmisc)
#run silently logistic regression and hide results from end users
#read the data set
mydata <- read.csv("../../data/boat/boats.csv", header = TRUE)
#read columns for Q1-Q18
mydata<-mydata[,2:82]
#define dependent variable
dep_data<-mydata$Q18
#define independent variables
mydata$Q18<-NULL
#create logistic regression model
ind_data<-as.matrix(mydata)
mylogreg <- glm(dep_data ~ ind_data, family = "binomial")
#display results
print(summary(mylogreg))
# 95% CI for the coefficients
ci95<-confint(mylogreg)
# exponentiated coefficients
expo_coef<-exp(coef(mylogreg))
# 95% CI for exponentiated coefficients
expo_coef95<-exp(confint(mylogreg))
# predicted values
predicted_values<-predict(mylogreg, type="response") 
# residuals
residuals<-residuals(mylogreg, type="deviance")

```
